Seems to be the same as: #4567

Also, anbai106 -- is there any reason you need to use the makefile in particular, or could you build the canonical way (using Bazel)? https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/get_started/os_setup.html#prepare-environment-for-mac-os-x

Also, anbai106 -- is there any reason you need to use the makefile in particular, or could you build the canonical way (using Bazel)? https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/get_started/os_setup.html#prepare-environment-for-mac-os-x
